Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Plot: An LA family with serious boundary issues has its past and future unravel when a dramatic admission causes everyone's secrets to spill out.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: The Letting Go
Episodes.Plot: Maura embraces her new journey, but nothing about life as a woman is easy ? making friends, finding a new community and, above all, coming out to her children. Sarah introduces her husband to her ex-girlfriend. Josh pays a visit to his ex-babysitter. Ali gets closer to her trainer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Rollin
Episodes.Plot: Maura moves out of the family house and into a lively new apartment complex, just as Sarah needs a new home after dismantling her perfect life. Josh has to reconsider his sudden vision of starting a family. Ali finds some new boundaries to cross.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Moppa
Episodes.Plot: Maura finally comes out to Ali and they join Sarah on a field trip to the mall, where they all get rude lessons in womanhood. Josh is forced to confront his past thanks to questions from Syd about his long-time relationship with Rita.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Wedge
Episodes.Plot: When Shelly's husband goes missing, Sarah, Josh and Ali set out to find him but instead find themselves lost in their past. Ali can no longer keep Maura's secret from Josh, which sends him into a tailspin. When Maura runs into a Pfefferman family friend she takes a stand for her new identity.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: The Wilderness
Episodes.Plot: As they struggle to come to terms with Maura, Josh looks for answers from a rabbi, and Ali looks for answers in a Gender Studies class with Syd. Sarah is left to answer questions from her own kids, who meet Maura for the first time.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Symbolic Exemplar
Episodes.Plot: Josh goes on a date with Raquel. Ali explores her feminine side with a TA from Gender Studies class. The kids turn out for Maura's performance in a talent show, but her delight quickly turns to dejection.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Best New Girl
Episodes.Plot: In a flashback, Mort escapes with a friend to a cross-dressing retreat in the woods, and becomes captivated with a very accepting woman. Left alone after cancelling her Bat Mitzvah, 13-year-old Ali finds trouble with an older man at the beach.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Looking Up
Episodes.Plot: Maura finds solace with ex-wife, Shelly, and the two hatch a plot to help Ed realize his wishes. Sarah spends time with her ex-husband and begins to question their breakup. Raquel finally breaks through to Josh. When all members of the family are summoned to Shelly's, they are in for a few surprises.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Why Do We Cover The Mirrors?
Episodes.Plot: A funeral brings all the Pfeffermans together and reunites them with their past ? Shelley and Maura with old friends, Sarah with her ex, and Josh with his teenage babysitter. Just when they thought there were no more secrets, the family busts out a few more.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language
